title: ADugirAn ennuL
sahitya:
ADugirAn ennuL pADugirAn kaNNan Ananda rAdhaiyuDan kaNNan


anupallavi

  ODugurAn mana vIDu niraindavan ucchik-kamalattil sacchidAnandamAi


caraNam    kATrena vandennai kaTTi aNaippAn kadirena kaNNuLLE pudumaigaL kATTuvAn
nATrisaiyum tozha nATakam naDippAn nanmai sheidOrkkellAm nalam pala purivAn
				(another last line version)
kUTrena vandum ikkUTTai pirittiDuvAn konjum kuzhandaiyAga nenjattirindu nidam
